data.title: Jenny McCarthy Reveals Her Husband Donnie Wahlberg Does This Romantic Gesture Every Week
data.meta_description: Jenny McCarthy and Donnie Wahlberg are going on 10 years of marriage, and their love just keeps getting stronger! While chatting with Access Hollywood, "The Masked Singer" star revealed the sweet gesture her husband does every week. She also revealed the moment she knew he was "the one." "I knew during the taping of my VH1 show when I was interviewing him," she told Access. "By the end of the interview I gave him my phone number. I had never given my phone number as the first person. I had never approached anyone first in Hollywood ever. He was the first one. At 40 years old, I was like, 'Here's my digits.'" The businesswoman also teased the epic celebrities fans will see unveiled in "The Masked Singer" this season, and she revealed who her dream contestant would be. Plus, she talked all about her makeup line Formless Beauty and its new mascara. Fans can watch "The Masked Singer" Wednesdays at 8/7c on Fox.
